r.d: Parses BBCode mark-up to tokenize the text for Text_Wiki rendering (Xhtml, plain, Latex) or for conversions using the existing renderers (wiki).
r.n: * Firman is now co-lead of the package * Added a test file to use with doc/Text_Wiki/doc/test_Text_Wiki.php * Added examples showing how to replace deprecated HTML_BBCodeParser by Text_Wiki_BBCode * # is optional for hexadecimal colours * Add superscript and subscript extension * Option relative_enable default false for relative urls, e.g., [url=/contact.php] (Request #5767) * Refuse ] , [ and ' in path part of the url, should be urlencoded * Fixed enumeration type [list=A] (as html type: a,A,i or I)
